data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Assing, Volker (2004): A revision of Callicerus Gravenhorst, Pseudosemiris Machulka, and related genera. III. A new genus and species from China, and additional records (Insecta: Coleoptera: Staphylinidae: Aleocharinae). Zootaxa 767: 1-8, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.158160
